actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide for emergency increases in the support level for the 1974 crop of flue-cured tobacco.

summary.text: Provides that the support level for the 1974 crop of Flue-cured tobacco shall be 110 percent of the support level determined in accordance with the provisions of the Agricultural Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to provide for emergency increases in the support level for the 1974 crop of flue-cured tobacco.
